title: Funny Signs Redux
content:
I figured that there must be more funny signs around, so I have kickstarted this thread again. To start off, here's one that I passed by today. Maybe it's just me, but I find this sign both quaint and amusing on several levels... You know, I've always wanted a private organist.   
   
 ![Private Organist - Parking Father](http://web.archive.org/web/20080306072043im_/http:/www.typophile.com/forums/messages/30/40493.jpg)

 [‹ Help for font name](http://web.archive.org/web/20080306072043/http:/typophile.com/node/5575 "Go to previous forum topic") [Indy for translations? ›](http://web.archive.org/web/20080306072043/http:/typophile.com/node/5554 "Go to next forum topic")
author: Grant Hutchinson

comments.content:
